title: Pro bike: Mark Cavendish’s stage-winning S-Works Tarmac SL7
content:
We take a look at Mark Cavendish's Tour de France stage-winning bike.

In one of the greatest comebacks of recent times, Mark Cavendish returned to winning ways at the Tour de France this week and is now back in the green jersey.

Cavendish’s stage four victory moved him to 31 career victories in the Tour de France, just nine months on from an emotional post-Gent-Wevelgem interview in which Cav hinted at retirement.

In this video, we take an exclusive look at the Deceuninck-QuickStep rider’s S-Works Tarmac SL7.

Editors Picks
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
